text: Jean Nidetch (born Jean Evelyn Slutsky, October 12, 1923 â€“ April 29, 2015) was an American businesswoman. She was the co-founder of the Weight Watchers organization. She founded the organization in 1963. Nidetch died on April 29, 2015, in Parkland, Florida at age 91. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Jean Nidetch
